text: Just as there is a word that has given rise to all words, says Luder, so there must be a sentence that contains all the teachings and all the wisdom of the world. When we discover it, time will cease to exist, for we have entered the immovable age of perfection. Finished by Luder, 1989
title: Dichos de Luder 15
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
